name: Keen Explore Mid Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Men's
categories: Explore Mid Waterproof Light Trail Shoes
description: Explore new areas in all day comfort that is burly enough for the trails and still looks good in the city. These waterproof light hiking shoes have an aggressive sole to take on muddy trails and loose terrain, and a lightweight mesh upper that keeps feet cool and comfy. The mid-height collar and a stability shank provide torsional rigidity and support on uneven ground.Lightweight mesh upper with printed overlays for durability.Keen.Dry waterproof-breathable membrane provides weather protection.Breathable mesh lining has a Cleansport NXT™ antimicrobial treatment to keeps feet fresh.Contoured heel lock adds stability.Removable, anatomic dual-density PU footbed provides arch support and comfort.EVA midsole for a cushioned ride and a stability shank adds lightweight support.KEEN.All-Terrain rubber outsole with 4mm multi-directional lugs provides reliable traction and grip.
